description.en: A very strong energy drink that completely refills the imbiber's FP while granting unlimited FP for a limited time. Lasts 1 hour.
description.ar: A very strong energy drink that completely refills the imbiber's FP while granting unlimited FP for a limited time. Lasts 1 hour.
description.br: Uma bebida energética muito forte que preenche completamente o FP do bebedor, ao mesmo tempo que concede FP ilimitado por um tempo determinado. Dura 1 hora.
description.cns: FP在1小时内维持饱满状态。
description.de: Ein sehr starkes Energiegetränk, das die Fokuspunkte (FP) vollständig auffüllt und für eine begrenzte Zeit unbegrenzte FP gewährt. Hält 1 Stunde an.
description.fi: A very strong energy drink that completely refills the imbiber's FP while granting unlimited FP for a limited time. Lasts 1 hour.
description.fil: A very strong energy drink that completely refills the imbiber's FP while granting unlimited FP for a limited time. Lasts 1 hour.
description.fr: Une boisson énergétique puissante vous octroyant des PF illimités pendant 1 heure.
description.id: Minuman energi yang sangat kuat yang sepenuhnya mengisi ulang FP si imbiber sambil memberikan FP tak terbatas untuk waktu yang terbatas. Berlangsung 1 jam.
description.it: A very strong energy drink that completely refills the imbiber's FP while granting unlimited FP for a limited time. Lasts 1 hour.
description.jp: 非常にスパイシーなエナジードリンクで、飲んだ者を覚醒させ一時的にFPが無制限になる。持続時間は1時間。
description.kr: 사용자에게 제한된 시간 동안 FP를 무한으로 사용할 수 있게 해주는 에너지가 넘치는 음료입니다. 1시간 동안 지속됩니다.
description.nl: A very strong energy drink that completely refills the imbiber's FP while granting unlimited FP for a limited time. Lasts 1 hour.
description.pl: Bardzo mocny napój energetyczny dająca pijącemu nielimitowane PS na czas 1 godziny.
description.ru: A very strong energy drink that completely refills the imbiber's FP while granting unlimited FP for a limited time. Lasts 1 hour.
description.sp: Una bebida energética muy fuerte que rellena por completo el FP del que la toma al tiempo que otorga FP ilimitados durante un tiempo limitado. Dura 1 hora.
description.sw: A very strong energy drink that completely refills the imbiber's FP while granting unlimited FP for a limited time. Lasts 1 hour.
description.th: เครื่องดื่มชูกำลังที่แรงมากซึ่งเติม FP ของผู้ดื่มได้อย่างสมบูรณ์ในขณะที่ให้ FP ไม่จำกัดในระยะเวลาจำกัด ระยะเวลา 1 ชั่วโมง
description.tw: FP 在1小時內維持飽滿狀態。
description.vi: Một thức uống năng lượng rất mạnh giúp nạp đầy hoàn toàn FP của người lính trong rừng đồng thời cấp FP không giới hạn trong một thời gian giới hạn. Kéo dài 1 giờ.
